value.title: Power BI Relationships Not Working? Four Steps to Debug üêû for the Power BI Beginner
value.excerpt: Are your Power BI Relationships not working? It can be so frustrating when that happens. The good news is that the four steps shown in this video will help you debug most of your Power BI Relationships problems.  00:00 Introduction 01:05 Tip #1 Debug Using Simple Table 02:03 Tip #2 Debug Using Simple

value.title: Power BI Relationships: Step-by-Step Example (Slightly Advanced)
value.excerpt: In this real-world example, we create a model to find matching blood donors. value.title: DAX Fridays! #81: CALCULATETABLE
value.excerpt: In todays video we are going to cover the DAX function CALCULATETABLE.  CALCULATETABLE allows you to create virtual tables that you can then filter using multiple conditions and use that table to make further calculations.   What is the difference between CALCULATETABLE and CALCULATE?  The first one

value.title: Schedule data downloads / exports in Power BI
value.excerpt: You can export data or download data out of Power BI in many different ways and depending on the source, you can schedule refresh those data dumps too.
